core.name: Autonomous UI Evolution Engine
core.description: Uses AI-driven design mutation and user feedback to continuously evolve UI components

core.name: Self-Healing Design System
core.description: Implements AI-powered design element regeneration based on usage patterns and user behavior

core.name: Generative Design Language Model
core.description: Trains a large language model on design principles and user interactions to generate novel UI components

supporting.name: Emotional Resonance Analyzer
supporting.description: Uses affective computing to analyze user emotional responses to different UI elements

supporting.name: Context-Aware Design Adapter
supporting.description: Dynamically adjusts UI components based on user context, environment, and device

supporting.name: Accessibility Guardian
supporting.description: Implements real-time accessibility checks and suggestions for UI components

integration.name: Cross-Platform UI Synchronizer
integration.description: Ensures consistent UI experience across different platforms and devices

integration.name: AR/VR/MR UI Bridge
integration.description: Seamlessly integrates UI components across augmented, virtual, and mixed reality environments

integration.name: Voice-Activated UI Controller
integration.description: Enables voice control for UI navigation and interactions

analytics.name: UI Performance Insights
analytics.description: Provides detailed analytics on UI performance, user engagement, and interaction patterns

analytics.name: User Behavior Anomaly Detector
analytics.description: Identifies unusual user behavior patterns and suggests potential design improvements

analytics.name: Design Drift Detector
analytics.description: Monitors design consistency and alerts on potential design drift

future.name: Neural Interface Design Studio
future.description: Explores the use of neural interfaces for designing and interacting with UI components

future.name: Quantum-Inspired UI Optimization
future.description: Applies quantum computing principles to optimize UI performance and user experience

future.name: Emotional Intelligence UI
future.description: Develops UI components that incorporate emotional intelligence and empathy
